title: 09/17/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/17/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
After a disappointing loss to Washington, Colin believes the New York Giants are showing everyone they don’t trust their young quarterback Daniel Jones. He discusses Tom Brady possibly playing until age 50 and why it is believable. Colin shares his Blazing 5 picks for week 2 of the NFL season. Plus, NFL insider Albert Breer joins the show to talk about the Packers front office and why they are unhappy with Aaron Rodgers since he's returned from his holdout.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
